item.description: We got Karaoke on Sunday Night and Labor Day on Monday, I'm planning on a Rocking Night of Karaoke. If you haven't had the chance the Rosebud is a Great place in the Somerville area for Karaoke, we got a stage, lighting, professional sound system, The Rosebud has great atmosphere, the best singers and the menu has a lot of great choices, prom pizza, buffalo wings, taco salads and more. So don't miss out on what The Rosebud has to offer. We hope to hear from you Come check us out.
item.name: Sunday Night Karaoke @ The Rosebud (Labor Day Eve)
